name.baseName: White granulated sugar, sheep sugar ; Raw sugar ; Carbonation ; All sizes; NESPS2
白砂糖、绵白糖 ; 原糖 ; 碳酸法 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPrecipitation separation + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPrecipitation separation + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集代表使用碳酸法生产不同规模操作的白砂糖和原糖的数据。生产出的糖类产品是各种烹饪应用、糖果、饮料、药用糖浆以及作为防腐剂等不可或缺的。此外，该数据集包含有关不同尾端处理技术的信息，这些技术对于减少糖厂废水中的污染至关重要。这些技术对于在废物释放到环境之前处理化学需氧量(COD)、氨氮、有机态氮和总磷等废产品非常关键。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码13,四级代码1340文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPrecipitation separation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management75
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是沉淀分离+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为75，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施正常运行时间（天/年）/生产天数（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPrecipitation separation + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是沉淀分离+好氧生物处理法，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施正常运行时间（天/年）/生产天数（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷
nan

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPrecipitation separation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是沉淀分离+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施正常运行时间（天/年）/生产天数（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPrecipitation separation + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80
